content.description: Start  on crimp rail on right side of arete. Work your way left of arete and go up straight
content.location:
This problem is right of macguffin problem. About

20ft right on the arete.

content.description: Stand start and climb the face behind the tree
content.location: Behind the tree to the left of Crimpciple of The Matter

content.description: Start on low jug rail. Climb up to a perfect rounded crimp and jump to a perfect rounded sloper.
content.location: On the left side of the main face when you approach.

content.description: Stand start on head height incut crimps. Finish straight up.
content.location: Around the far side of the boulder to the right of Crimpciple of the Matter.

content.description: A core intensive climb on small crimps.  Sit start on the same low, flat crimps that the MacGuffin starts on.  Move up and right, following small holds at the lip of the roof.  As you near the arete, make a large move to a left facing ledge, then move up to top out near the arete.
content.protection: A few crash pads and spotters to move the pads as you traverse.
content.location: This route climbs along the low, small roof on the main face of the MacGuffin boulder along the main trail.  Look for it right of a narrow corridor and arete.

content.description: Stand start in the seam, big dyno to a sloper, finish up and slightly right.
content.location: Around the far side of the boulder to the left of Lost My Keys just right of the tree.

content.description: Sit start in the corner and utilize the dihedral crack and other features to gain the arete and top out using big holds on gently overhanging terrain.
content.protection: You'll want a couple pads for this one.  A spotter moving the pad(s) helps.
content.location: Look for the roof on the side of the MacGuffin boulder that faces the main cliff edge.  Under that roof in the left corner is where this problem starts.
